sn24.36:4.2: “Kismiṃ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṃ upādāya, kiṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.36:4.3: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.36:5.1: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṃ upādāya, rūpaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.36:5.2: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn24.36:5.6: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṃ upādāya, viññāṇaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.36:5.7: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti.
sn24.36:6.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn24.36:6.3: vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.36:6.4: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.36:6.6: “Iti kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe sati, dukkhaṃ upādāya, dukkhaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.36:6.7: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn24.36:6.13: vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.36:6.14: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.36:6.16: “Iti kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe sati, dukkhaṃ upādāya dukkhaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.36:6.17: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
